title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same features as Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs & embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible API).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, prompt templates, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & reactive APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST endpoints; chat, embed, list models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-built Rust crate providing typed async bindings to Ollama.

title: Ollama on Reddit
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, integrations and feature requests.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators & embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: LangChain, LlamaIndex, Docker, GPU tuning, fine-tuning, and edge deployments.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to integrate local Ollama models into no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-llamaindex
summary: LlamaIndex LLM & embedding drivers for Ollama enabling local RAG apps.

title: ollama-gpu
summary: Docker images with CUDA & ROCm variants and benchmarks for running Ollama on GPUs.

title: ollama-hacker-news
summary: Hacker News discussion on Ollama v0.1.35 release featuring multi-model serving and ARM builds.
